statements: SELECT * FROM secure_connections;
SELECT connection_id, connection_name FROM secure_connections WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT connection_name, certificate_path FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM secure_connections WHERE status = 'inactive';
SELECT connection_id, certificate_key_path FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_name LIKE 'SSL%';
SELECT * FROM secure_connections WHERE status='active';
SELECT connection_id, connection_name FROM secure_connections ORDER BY connection_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_name LIKE '%test%';
SELECT connection_id FROM secure_connections WHERE status='inactive' ORDER BY connection_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_connections FROM secure_connections;
SELECT * FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM ssl_certificates WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT certificate_name, certificate_type FROM ssl_certificates ORDER BY certificate_issued_by DESC;
SELECT client_id, server_id FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_status = 'pending' ORDER BY server_id, client_id ASC;
SELECT certificate_name, certificate_issued_by, expiry_date FROM ssl_certificates WHERE certificate_type = 'wildcard' LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, client_id, server_id, connection_status FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM ssl_certificates WHERE certificate_type = 'SSL';
SELECT id, certificate_name, certificate_issued_by, expiry_date FROM ssl_certificates ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT id, client_id, server_id, connection_status FROM secure_connections WHERE client_id = 100 OR server_id = 200;
SELECT server_id, COUNT(*) AS total_connections FROM secure_connections GROUP BY server_id HAVING total_connections > 1;
SELECT * FROM secure_connections;
SELECT connection_name, connection_type FROM secure_connections WHERE id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT connection_name FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_type = 'SSL';
SELECT * FROM ssl_certificates ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT certificate_name, issuer_name FROM ssl_certificates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT connection_name, connection_type FROM secure_connections ORDER BY connection_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ssl_certificates WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT channel_name, channel_type, certificate_name FROM communication_channel JOIN ssl_certificates ON communication_channel.associated_cert_id = ssl_certificates.certificate_id;
SELECT connection_name, certificate_file FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_type = 'HTTP';
SELECT * FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_id = 1;
SELECT connection_id, connection_name FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM ssl_certificates ORDER BY cert_expiry_date DESC;
SELECT cert_name, cert_expiry_date FROM ssl_certificates WHERE cert_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_id = 1;
SELECT connection_name, connection_host, connection_protocol FROM secure_connections WHERE connection_port IS NOT NULL;
SELECT cert_name, cert_expiry_date FROM ssl_certificates WHERE cert_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM connection_logs WHERE connection_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT username FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM secure_connection;
SELECT id, client_id, server_id FROM secure_connection WHERE id = 1;
SELECT ssl_certificate FROM secure_connection WHERE server_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM client_connections WHERE connection_status = 'active';
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM security_tools;
SELECT * FROM secure_connection WHERE id = 1;
SELECT client_id, server_id, ssl_certificate FROM secure_connection WHERE server_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ssl_certificates ORDER BY certificate_name DESC;
SELECT connection_id, connection_status FROM client_connections WHERE connection_status = 'connected';
SELECT tool_id, tool_name, tool_description FROM security_tools WHERE tool_description IS NOT NULL;
